display_long_description:
the ultimate virtual reality sandbox where physics comes alive.
Experience total freedom in a world built for experimentation, chaos, and fun. Every vehicle, object, and explosion reacts with true-to-life physics — giving you the power to drive, crash, climb, shoot, and destroy like never before.

Hop behind the wheel of fast cars, massive trucks, and heavy machinery. Feel the weight of every impact as you smash through obstacles, launch off ramps, or send vehicles flying with realistic collisions. Grab onto ledges, climb walls, and explore using full physics-based interactions that make every move feel natural and immersive.

Unleash your inner chaos creator — set off explosions, throw objects, and use a full arsenal of weapons including guns, bows, and more. Every object in the world can be interacted with, destroyed, or turned into a tool of fun.

Whether you’re testing out crazy stunts, experimenting with game physics, or just blowing things up, PhysiX Playground is your open-ended space to play your way.

Features:

🏎️ Drive, crash, and destroy cars and heavy vehicles with real physics.

💥 Create chaos with explosions, weapons, and interactive destruction.

🧗 Climb and move freely using realistic physics interactions.

🔫 Use guns, bows, and tools to interact with the world your way.

🌎 Full VR immersion with intuitive controls and satisfying physics.

It’s not just a game — it’s your playground of
